# XmlFormatterBase.ComputeWhitespaceBehavior method

What should be done with the whitespace in the provided text node? This operates independently of alignment.

```csharp
protected virtual Behavior ComputeWhitespaceBehavior(XText t)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| t | A text node |

## Return Value

enumerant indicating the behavior to take
